task.title: Give Your New Role Access to the Node Group You Created

step.cmd: From the Web developer role page, click the Permissions tab.
In the Type box, select Node groups.
In the Permission box, select View.
In the Object box, select web-app_servers.
Click Add permission, and then click the commit button.

taskbody.result: Now, you have given members of the Web developers role permission to view the web_app_servers node group.
